text: René Xavier Marie Alain Cuny (12 July 1908 - 16 May 1994) was a French actor. He was known for his roles in movies directed by Paul Claudel and Antonin Artaud. He also worked with Marcel Carné, Louis Malle, Jean-Luc Godard, Federico Fellini, Michelangelo Antonioni, Francesco Rosi and Luis Buñuel. He was nominated for the César Award for Best Supporting Actor for the 1988 movie Camille Claudel. He won the Joseph Plateau Lifetime Achievement Award in 1992. Cuny died on 16 May 1994 in Paris, France at the age of 85.James Kirkup. "Obituary: Alain Cuny", in The Independent, 18 May 1994.
